sam.display
Class samConnector

java.lang.Object
  |

All Implemented Interfaces:
diva.canvas.CanvasComponent, diva.canvas.connector.Connector, diva.canvas.Figure, diva.util.UserObjectContainer, diva.canvas.VisibleComponent
public class samConnector
extends diva.canvas.connector.AbstractConnector

A Connector that draws itself in a straight line. The connector uses an instance of PaintedShape to draw itself, so see that class for a more detailed description of the paint- and stroke-related methods.

Constructor Detail

samConnector

public samConnector(diva.canvas.Site tail,
                    diva.canvas.Site head)
Create a new sam connector between the given sites. The connector is drawn with a width of one and in black.
Method Detail

route

public void route()
Tell the connector to route itself between the current positions of the head and tail sites.
Overrides:
route in class diva.canvas.connector.AbstractConnector

translate

public void translate(double x,
                      double y)
Translate the connector. This method is implemented, since controllers may wish to translate connectors when the sites at both ends are moved the same distance.
Overrides:
translate in class diva.canvas.connector.AbstractConnector
